REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f1554 reute b f BC-/K-MART-<KM>-RAISES-P 03-24 0083

TEXT.TITLE: K MART <KM> RAISES PAYOUT, VOTES SPLIT
TEXT.BODY: K mart Corp said its board approved a 17.6 pct increase in the quarterly dividend and declared a three-for-two stock split. The company raised its dividend to 43.5 cts a presplit share, up from the previous 37 cts a share. After the split, the new quarterly dividend rate is equivalent to 29 cts a share. It is payable June Eight, record May 21. It said the additional shares will be distributed June Five, record May 21. Reuter
